name: Agentico
description: AI consulting and automation solutions for trades and professional services businesses. We design custom AI solutions that streamline operations, reduce costs, and drive growth for small to medium-sized businesses.

itemOffered.name: Process Automation
itemOffered.description: Automate repetitive tasks like quote generation, invoice processing, and customer communication to save time and reduce errors.

itemOffered.name: Document Intelligence
itemOffered.description: Extract, analyze, and organize information from documents automatically using AI-powered document processing.

itemOffered.name: Custom AI Agents
itemOffered.description: Build intelligent agents that handle specific tasks like customer inquiries, data entry, or workflow coordination.

itemOffered.name: Workflow Automation
itemOffered.description: Connect systems and automate end-to-end business processes from lead capture to project completion.

itemOffered.name: Integration Services
itemOffered.description: Seamlessly integrate AI solutions with existing tools like Xero, QuickBooks, CRM systems, and project management software.

itemOffered.name: Training & Support
itemOffered.description: Comprehensive training and ongoing support to ensure successful adoption and maximum value from AI solutions.

audience.description: Builders, construction companies, plumbers, electricians, HVAC contractors, and mechanical services providers looking to automate operations and improve efficiency.
Law firms, accounting firms, HR consultancies, and professional service providers seeking to streamline workflows and reduce administrative overhead.

itemListElement.name: Automation Solutions
itemListElement.description: Reduce manual work and human error with intelligent automation

itemListElement.name: Document Processing
itemListElement.description: Transform document-heavy processes with AI-powered extraction and analysis

itemListElement.name: Integration Services
itemListElement.description: Connect AI solutions with your existing business systems

slogan: Transform Your Business with Intelligent Automation
keywords: AI consulting, business automation, process automation, workflow automation, document intelligence, AI solutions, trades automation, professional services automation, custom AI agents, business process optimization, Australia AI consulting
